document.full_text: lanford wilson reflected the disenchantment that came to pervade the united states in the 1960s and 1970s, but his work exuded a sentimentality that seemed to come from an earlier time.
document.title: an appraisal: playwright infusing his losers with love
lines_and_colors: lanford wilson reflected the disenchantment that came to pervade the united states in the 1960s and 1970s, but his work exuded a sentimentality that seemed to come from an earlier time.
